Name: Nightmare Simulator 2 Rebirth
About the game: You wake up in an unknown town... You have no idea what happened to you. You can't remember who you are but the first thing you see is a town. You head towards it unknowingly walking into danger... Monsters... Monsters everywhere! Can you survive and find the answers you seek about who you once were? [Features] 1. Cutscenes 2. Advanced inventory. 3. Auto save 4. Based on real map of Andong&Busan, Korea. 5. Explore Akihabara, Japan! 6. Boss battle based on phase system.
